member.name: APP_MEMORY_INFORMATION
member.summary: Represents app memory usage at a single point in time. This structure is used by the enumeration.

member.name: APP_MEMORY_INFORMATION.AvailableCommit
member.summary: Total commit available to the app.

member.name: APP_MEMORY_INFORMATION.PrivateCommitUsage
member.summary: The app's usage of private commit.

member.name: APP_MEMORY_INFORMATION.PeakPrivateCommitUsage
member.summary: The app's peak usage of private commit.

member.name: APP_MEMORY_INFORMATION.TotalCommitUsage
member.summary: The app's total usage of private plus shared commit.
